author: jacopoc
msg: Removed from 13.07 branch all the specialpurpose components except "ecommerce" (tests and other parts of the systems still have dependencies on it): the 13.07.* releases will only contain the core applications+ecommerce while the specialpurpose components will be available in the trunk and the OFBiz Community may decide to release them separately.
